attributes.additional_details: If the government seriously cared about this aspect of health, they would be doing more to reduce poverty and improve education. This legislation is doing far more harm than good, and should be revoked to improve the mental health of everyone.
attributes.background: New legislation has recently come into place, forcing calories to be put on menus, under the guise of 'tackling the obesity crisis'. This legislation is already doing more to perpetuate and create eating disorders than it will to tackle any crisis.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care
